title: FUNAvg: Federated Uncertainty Weighted Averaging for Datasets with Diverse Labels
excerpt: The paper introduces FUNAvg, a method for federated learning that incorporates uncertainty weighting to handle diverse labels.
citation: Tölle, M., Menze, B., Engelhardt, S. et al. "FUNAvg: Federated Uncertainty Weighted Averaging." MICCAI 2024.

title: Content-Aware Differential Privacy with Conditional Invertible Neural Networks
excerpt: Discusses a novel approach to differential privacy using conditional invertible neural networks that are content-aware.
citation: Tölle, M., Köthe, U., Engelhardt, S. et al. "Content-Aware Differential Privacy." MICCAI 2022 Workshop.

title: Posterior temperature optimized Bayesian models for inverse problems in medical imaging
excerpt: This paper presents optimized Bayesian models for solving inverse problems in medical imaging using posterior temperature.
citation: Laves, M.-H., Tölle, M., Engelhardt, S. et al. "Posterior temperature optimized Bayesian models." Medical Image Analysis.

title: A mean-field variational inference approach to deep image prior for inverse problems
excerpt: Explores a mean-field variational inference approach to deep image prior for addressing inverse problems in medical imaging.
citation: Tölle, M., Laves, M.-H., Schlaefer, A. "A Mean-Field Variational Inference Approach." MIDL 2021.

title: Uncertainty Estimation in Medical Image Denoising with Bayesian Deep Image Prior
excerpt: This paper explores uncertainty estimation in medical image denoising using a Bayesian deep image prior.
citation: Laves, M.-H., Tölle, M., Ortmaier, T. "Uncertainty Estimation in Medical Image Denoising." MICCAI 2020 Workshop. Best Paper Award.
